path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/DYOR Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner can reset total fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to reset total fees.

findings.title: Owner can change minimumTokensBeforeSwap
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum tokens required before a swap operation.

findings.title: Owner can change operations, marketing, development and liquidity addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify critical contract settings, including operations, marketing, development, and liquidity addresses.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract tokens and BNBs
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw contract tokens and BNBs.

findings.title: Owner can change all fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify all fees in the contract.

findings.title: Owner can airdrop to wallets
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to airdrop tokens to wallets without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee and the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from fees and maximum transaction amounts, which could lead to unfair advantages.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Out of gas in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Out of gas in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Out of gas in airdropToWallets() function
findings.description: The function airdropToWallets() uses a loop to airdrop amounts from a list and could be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: No checking of owner’s balance to fit airdrop amount
findings.description: The function airdropToWallets() does not check if the owner's balance is sufficient to cover the airdrop amount.
